Name: Archaeomancer
Text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

Name: Aether Adept
Text: When Aether Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

Name: Stealer of Secrets
Text: Whenever Stealer of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

Name: Sea Gate Oracle
Text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

Name: Crosstown Courier
Text: Whenever Crosstown Courier deals combat damage to a player, that player mills that many cards.

Name: Merfolk Wayfinder
Text: Flying\nWhen Merfolk Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all Island cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Name: Krovikan Mist
Text: Flying\nKrovikan Mist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Illusions on the battlefield.

Name: Dream Stalker
Text: When Dream Stalker enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

Name: Chronomaton
Text: {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Chronomaton.

Name: Jace, Architect of Thought
Text: [+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn.\n[−2]: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order.\n[−8]: For each player, search that player's library for a nonland card and exile it, then that player shuffles. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

Name: Aether Figment
Text: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)\nAether Figment can't be blocked.\nIf Aether Figment was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

Name: Phantasmal Bear
Text: When Phantasmal Bear becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

Text: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

Name: Sadistic Augermage

At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
